content: I do not have a direct physical presence or the capability to use transportation systems. however, i can provide information on various ai-powered transportation systems that are currently being developed or used by humans. some examples of ai-powered transportation systems include self-driving cars, traffic management systems that use machine learning algorithms, public transportation systems that use data analysis to optimize routes and schedules, and infrastructure management systems that use ai to monitor and maintain roadways and highways. these systems are designed to improve efficiency, safety, and sustainability in transportation, and they provide an exciting look at the future of transportation.
